channel.title: Ranch Blog on Royal Flush Ranch
channel.description: Recent content in Ranch Blog on Royal Flush Ranch

item.title: first post
item.description: Hello Hi, welcome to our blog. We are Craig and Heather Drummond and we have been married for 20 years. We have lived in Colorado, Nevada, and now (and forever) Texas. Royal Flush Ranch is an umbrella site for our ventures and hobbies.
